data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Point Sal, California, USA (PTS)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Point Sal, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway Tidbit Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. TBIC32+4+27) beginning 1999-09-04. The instrument depth was 014 meters, in an overall water depth of 015 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
